knimeNode.name: Conformal Calibration Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Splits the input table into two new tables: training and calibration.

fullDescription.intro: Splits the input table into two new tables: training and calibration. The procedure is repeated several times for every loop iteration.
fullDescription.option: Defines the number of training/calibration splits and number of loop iterations.
Similar to Partitioning node splits input table into two datasets.
